name: Compact II Cabinet
subtitle: litter hideaway | pet house
description:
Featuring an entrance on both ends, this dual-purpose side table adds sleek, modern style without taking up too much extra space! Designed to conveniently disguise unsightly litter pans or be used as a place for your modern cat (or dog!) to play, perch or sleep, this cabinet also fits perfectly into your home’s modern décor.

Pair with the Standard Cabinet to reduce litter tracking and add extra aesthetic appeal.

details.title: Features
content: Handcrafted with 3/4" Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Holes on either side allow for ventilation and easy moving
Optional removable 1" foam cushion in your choice of fabric
Optional removable 2" foam bed with washable fleece cover

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote
